Articles.Content:
Hi,

I\'ve been playing the free version of this game for a while, bought the commercial game this morning and have been trying to figure out what to do with spaceplanes.

After several attempts that resulted in massive yawing on the runway, I found the control surfaces part but I can\'t figure out how to fit them!

I can get them to attach to the delta wings as per the screenshots attached, but I can\'t see how to get them to attach properly. Can anyone see what I\'m doing wrong?
Press Q/E/W/A/S/D at random until it\'s facing in the correct direction. Works for me.

Aye, you can rotate parts with WASDQE and use Shift for fine rotational control. Normally for those, just press D to realign them correctly.

The control surfaces are a bit odd in that their attachment node puts them at funny angles. I think the small one is usually similar, but you often need to press W to get it aligned properly instead.

About the yawing on the runway - that\'s a bug caused (IIRC) by collisions between parts affecting the physics in wonky ways, so if you avoid having too many parts that stick inside each other a bit, you can minimise this.

I think this is meant to be fixed in the next version. Or something to do with parts colliding anyway.
